title: The Long Arm of the Gur
tags: the long arm of the gur
content: The Long Arm of the Gur Rare 3~12 Damage 1d10 +2 Piercing Revenant Scourge: When used against undead creatures this weapon has +1d4 bonus to Attack and Damage rolls. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: When the boy was seven, he was frightened badly by a vampire spawn during a public burning. Seized by the flames, the creature didn't shrivel up. It swelled and burst like a squeezed leech. Brains splattered the boy's shoes, grey-pink and pulpy.He would never forget it
